module.sqlWrap: SELECT Top (@Top) zc.ZCId,zc.ShopUserId,zc.ShopTitle,zc.Title,zc.DateFrom,zc.DateTo,zc.app_preview_img, u.LogoUrl as ShopUserLogoUrl,zc.[Description] FROM ZhongChous zc INNER JOIN Users u ON zc.ShopUserId = u.UserId where zc.status = 1 ORDER BY zc.Created DESC

SELECT Top (@Top) zc.ZCId,zc.ShopUserId,zc.ShopTitle,zc.Title,zc.DateFrom,zc.DateTo,zc.app_preview_img, u.LogoUrl as ShopUserLogoUrl,zc.[Description] FROM ZhongChous zc INNER JOIN Users u ON zc.ShopUserId = u.UserId where zc.iosTemp = 1 ORDER BY zc.Created DESC

SELECT zc.ZCId,zc.ShopUserId,zc.ShopTitle,zc.Title,zc.DateFrom,zc.DateTo,zc.app_preview_img,zc.Description, u.LogoUrl as ShopUserLogoUrl ,zc.[Description] FROM ZhongChous zc INNER JOIN Users u ON zc.ShopUserId = u.UserId where zc.ZCId in(@CrowdfundingIds) SELECT zcp.Id,zcp.ZCId,zcp.Title,zcp.Content,zcp.Price,zcp.Qty,zcp.Created FROM ZhongChouPackages zcp where zcp.ZCId in(@CrowdfundingIdsForItem)

SELECT zc.ZCId,zc.ShopUserId,zc.ShopTitle,zc.Title,zc.Description,zc.DateFrom,zc.DateTo,zc.ToGetMoney,zc.app_preview_img, u.LogoUrl as ShopUserLogoUrl,zc.[Description] FROM ZhongChous zc INNER JOIN Users u ON zc.ShopUserId = u.UserId where zc.ZCId =@CrowdfundingId SELECT zcp.Id,zcp.ZCId,zcp.Title,zcp.Content,zcp.Price,zcp.Qty,zcp.ShowIdx,zcp.Created FROM ZhongChouPackages zcp where zcp.ZCId=@CrowdfundingIdForItem order by zcp.ShowIdx
SELECT zp.*,zc.Title as ZCTitle FROM ZhongChouPackages zp INNER JOIN ZhongChous zc ON zc.ZCId = zp.ZCId where zp.Id=@CrowdfundingItemId

select UserId as SupportUserId,LogoUrl as SupportLogoUrl from Users where UserId in(select distinct BuyUserId from Trade_Items where GoodId in(select Id from ZhongChouPackages where ZCId=@ZCId) and Status=40)
select count(distinct BuyUserId ) from Trade_Items where GoodId in((select Id from ZhongChouPackages where ZCId=@ZCId))
select isnull(Sum(TatalPrice),0) from Trade_Items where GoodId in (select Id from ZhongChouPackages where ZCId=@ZCId) and Status=40
